thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 3 of 736
thread.title: KENNETH
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by KENNETH

author: KENNETH
title: KENNETH
text:
I hired the car and it had 3/4 a tank of fuel . I stopped when i noticed it (traveled 150 mtrs) and rang them told them i took a photo of the fuel Gage and offered to return the car so they could see it . I was told its ok and they would fix it upon my return.I seen the return guy and he said it was all good . But the aholes still charges me $15 for the fuel and have not responded to any of my 15 emails . They have the money they don't care.
Will never use them again or recommend a thieving company that doesn't care about there customers this just my opinion though
